definition: a piece of poetry, compose rhymes
details:
noun
- a piece of poetry
= synonyms: verse
- correspondence in the sounds of two or more lines (especially final sounds)
= synonyms: rime
verb
- compose rhymes
= synonyms: rime
- be similar in sound, especially with respect to the last syllable
= example: be similar in sound, especially with respect to the last syllable
= synonyms: rime
